career_paths.name: R&D Scientist
career_paths.description: Conducts experiments and develops new products or technologies within biotech, pharma, or industry labs.

career_paths.name: Process Development Scientist
career_paths.description: Optimizes lab discoveries into scalable, manufacturable processes for industry use.

career_paths.name: Regulatory Affairs Specialist
career_paths.description: Ensures compliance with government regulations for new drugs, devices, or technologies.

career_paths.name: Clinical Research Associate
career_paths.description: Oversees clinical trials and ensures protocols and safety regulations are followed.

career_paths.name: Data Scientist
career_paths.description: Applies statistical and computational techniques to analyze complex datasets and extract insights.

career_paths.name: Bioinformatics Scientist
career_paths.description: Uses computational tools to analyze biological data such as genomics, proteomics, or imaging.

career_paths.name: Medical Science Liaison (MSL)
career_paths.description: Serves as the scientific expert connecting pharma/biotech companies with clinicians and researchers.

career_paths.name: Technology Transfer Officer
career_paths.description: Helps move innovations from academia into commercial applications through licensing and partnerships.

career_paths.name: Intellectual Property (IP) Analyst
career_paths.description: Assesses patent landscapes, writes patents, and helps organizations protect their innovations.

career_paths.name: Product Manager
career_paths.description: Coordinates between science, engineering, and business to develop and launch products.

career_paths.name: Management Consultant (Life Sciences/Tech)
career_paths.description: Advises companies on strategy, operations, and growth opportunities using analytical expertise.

career_paths.name: Venture Capital Analyst / Associate
career_paths.description: Evaluates startup technologies, performs due diligence, and advises investment decisions.

career_paths.name: Scientific / Medical Writer
career_paths.description: Translates complex scientific information into clear, accessible documents for publications, grants, or industry.

career_paths.name: Science Communicator
career_paths.description: Engages public audiences with science via media, events, podcasts, or museums.

career_paths.name: Science Illustrator / Animator
career_paths.description: Creates visuals and animations that explain scientific processes and data.

career_paths.name: UX Researcher / Designer
career_paths.description: Applies research skills to study user behavior and improve product interfaces.

career_paths.name: Technical Writer
career_paths.description: Writes manuals, documentation, and user guides for complex technologies.

career_paths.name: Copywriter (Science/Tech Focused)
career_paths.description: Crafts persuasive marketing and branding content for companies with technical products.

career_paths.name: Market Analyst (Life Sciences/Tech)
career_paths.description: Analyzes market trends, competition, and opportunities to guide business decisions.

career_paths.name: Business Development Manager
career_paths.description: Builds partnerships, negotiates deals, and drives growth opportunities for companies.

career_paths.name: Entrepreneur / Startup Founder
career_paths.description: Leverages scientific expertise to create and grow a new company or product.

career_paths.name: Operations Manager (Biotech/Tech)
career_paths.description: Oversees teams, resources, and workflows to ensure organizational efficiency.

career_paths.name: Science Policy Analyst
career_paths.description: Advises policymakers and organizations on science-related issues and policies.

career_paths.name: Nonprofit Program Manager
career_paths.description: Manages programs in education, health, or environment at mission-driven organizations.

career_paths.name: STEM Education & Outreach Specialist
career_paths.description: Designs and runs outreach or educational programs to inspire students and the public.

career_paths.name: Public Health Analyst
career_paths.description: Analyzes health data and policies to improve community and population health outcomes.

career_paths.name: NGO / Think Tank Researcher
career_paths.description: Conducts evidence-based studies for organizations shaping global or social policies.
